articles.title: When Amitabh Bachchan refused to say a dialogue in Kaalia, director walked off set: ‘His mood wasn’t good’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Amitabh Bachchan refused to say a dialogue on the set of Kaalia which led to a big fight with the director.
articles.content: Amitabh Bachchan was at the peak of his stardom when he worked with director Tinnu Anand on Kaalia. This was Tinnu’s first film and Amitabh was an established superstar. In a recent interview, Tinnu … [+2787 chars]

articles.description: Diljit Dosanjh entertained guests with a live performance at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchants pre-wedding bash He has now hilariously dubbed a video from the event
